Entocort EC (budesonide):I have been on it for 8 years. Have tried to wean off but always start to have Crohnâ€™s  symptoms again. I still have flares periodically on the medication but they are minimal.Happy it works for me.

Entocort EC (budesonide):Been on it for 7 years. Works well for me, but I should find a better long term solution. Almost no flare ups. Minimal side effects since it's only a locally absorbed steroid.
Entocort EC (budesonide):I have had no problems with it and when I go off it I get a Crohn's relapse.  It's worth the expense to have my health.
Entocort EC (budesonide):It gave me profuse sweating, minimal weight gain. I had nausea, elevated liver enzymes and elevated cholesterol during the 8 week course for acute disease.
